Logging.LogLevel:
Choose one of: trace, debug, info, warn, err, critical, off.
Trace is useless(For Now)

User Details.Username: The Name that should appear in the logs

Aimed.Enable: Ultimate Kill Switch For All Aimed Spells stuff

Change Speed.Enable: If Enabled, Will Change Base Speed of all Aimed Fire and Forget Spells
Change Speed.Speed: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 1000.0

Limit Speed.Enable: If Enabled, Makes Sure All Aimed Fire and Forget Spell's Base Speed lie inbetween "Min" and "Max" Values.
Limit Speed.Min: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 10.0
Limit Speed.Max: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 1000.0

Randomize Speed.Enable: If Enabled, Randomizes All Aimed Fire and Forget Spell's Base Speed to lie inbetween "Min" and "Max" Values.
Randomize Speed.Min: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 3000.0
Randomize Speed.Max: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 12000.0

Change Gravity.Enable: If Enabled, Will Change Base Gravity of all Aimed Fire and Forget Spells
Change Gravity.Gravity: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 1.0

Limit Gravity.Enable: If Enabled, Makes Sure All Aimed Fire and Forget Spell's Base Gravity lie inbetween "Min" and "Max" Values.
Limit Gravity.Min: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 0.0
Limit Gravity.Max: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 3.0
